name: cardidd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: Any set is equinumerous to its cardinal number. Deduction form of ~ cardid . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
